version_description:
Fixed Album Display.
Toggle between showing and hiding iCloud and DRM tracks by pulling the list down.

Redesign to support multitasking and all orientations
Removed hamburger menu
Added option to sort playlist alphabetically
Full screen spectrum analyzer in both landscape and portrait available
Watch app complication
3D touch support
The audio engine has not been modified and the sound quality is the same high standard as ever.

Bugfixes
iOS features: Added elapsed and remaining time
Apple Watch features: Play and Pause right from the Apple Watch

Fixed the missing settings switches
Option to hide the preamp slider
Bugfixes
Fixed Remote Control and Control Centre

Fixed bottom colour for iPhone X
Fixed remote control play/pause
Other bug fixes

Bugfixes for iOS12
Presets are sorted alphabetically
Added Volume Control on Watch App
Added ability to save/edit your own playlists

Updated to latest iOS version
Fixed a few search related bugs
Fixed disabled eq curve and preset buttons
Other stability bug fixes
